Posts.HTML:
I'm really happy to announce my first game, Dysnomia!

It's a surreal maze game, where you play the protagonist who solves puzzles and finds clues to escape a labyrinth. The music is composed and performed by me, it's sort of an orchestral/electronic/ambient/jazz hybrid score. I focused a lot on ambiance and intuitive puzzle design. It's pretty short, people say it takes under an hour to beat, but hopefully it's fun to play, and not too hard or too easy. I put a lot of work into debugging it and had a lot of friends play it too, but I'm not convinced it's bug free, so if you find any, please let me know.

I would love to hear what you think of it, all feedback welcome!

Here's the link: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... g/dysnomia
